title: The Prince's Mutiny
description: In the future, the world has been united under one single government called the Union. The world, once called Earth, is now called Novus.Under the rule of a single Prime Minister, the regions of the world groan for freedom. The Prime Minister's son, a young man named Henry, takes it upon himself to resolve the Union's problems in the Middle East.While there, Henry finds himself caught between the expectations of his father and the directives of his own conscience. The fate of an entire region depends upon which one he will choose...
author: Mariel Anne Loquais
